title: trilOka mAtA
sahitya:
trilOka mAta nannu brOvu karuNanu dina dinamikanu brOvumu ambA


anupallavi

  vilOkimpamu sadaya nannu callani vIkSinci kSaNamuna kAmAkSi


caraNam 1    ninnu nammiyuNDaga shrama paDavalEnA nE nendugana dikku ninnuvinA 
ghanamugA kOrakala kOri kOri Emi gAnaka khinnaDanaiti dhanyu jEsi
    caraNam 2    japamu leruganu tapamu leruganu capala cittuDanu satatamu krpaku 
pAtruDanu vEDEdanu ninu kIrtinci eTlaina nI biDDayani
    caraNam 3    maruvaka ninu nE madi talacaganu manninci veravakumana rAdA 
sharaNamE sujanula pAli kalpavallI shankarI shyAmakrSNa sOdarI
